title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts for multiple cities using OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website with dark/light theme toggle, project showcase, and contact form. The site you're currently viewing!

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application with multiple rooms, user authentication, and message history using WebSockets.

title: Expense Tracker
description: A personal finance application for tracking expenses, visualizing spending patterns, and setting budgets.
